stage_mapping.name: HEAT
stage_mapping.description: Apply heat to liquid in flask

anchor_interpretation: RETURN stage - where everything cycles back

operator_interpretation.qo-qo-qo: Sustained heating to maintain reflux - continuous energy input

INTERPRETATION:
The dominant 4-cycle structure maps to the 4-stage physical process of Reflux Distillation / Azeotropic Systems.

STAGE SEQUENCE:
HEAT -> VAPORIZE -> CONDENSE -> RETURN -> (repeat)

ANCHOR NODE 's':
The cycle anchor 's' corresponds to the RETURN stage -
RETURN stage - where everything cycles back

OPERATOR 'qo':
The canonical sequence [qo, qo, qo] represents Sustained heating to maintain reflux - continuous energy input.
This explains why 'qo' appears so frequently (7573 times with node 'k') -
it's the primary control action maintaining the process in its operating regime.

CYCLE MEANING:
Each 4-cycle is not a sequence of steps but a MAINTENANCE LOOP -
the process naturally cycles through these stages to maintain purity/quality.
The 500+ distinct 4-cycles represent different operating conditions or variants.
